org.sakaiproject.tool.impl

Class SessionComponent

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.sakaiproject.tool.impl.SessionComponent
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.sakaiproject.tool.api.SessionManager, org.sakaiproject.tool.api.SessionStore
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    SessionComponentTest

    public abstract class SessionComponent
extends Object
implements org.sakaiproject.tool.api.SessionManager, org.sakaiproject.tool.api.SessionStore

    Standard implementation of the Sakai SessionManager.

    • Field Detail

      • m_sessions

        protected Map<String,org.sakaiproject.tool.api.Session> m_sessions
        The sessions - keyed by session id.

      • expirationTimeSuggestionMap

        protected Map<String,org.apache.commons.lang.mutable.MutableLong> expirationTimeSuggestionMap
        The expected time sessions may be ready for expiration. This is only an optimization for when Terracotta is in use, to prevent faulting Session objects into the local JVM when it is not necessary. Session.isInactive() method remains the ultimate authority to determine if a session is invalid or not.

      • m_maintenance

        protected SessionComponent.Maintenance m_maintenance
        The maintenance.
